thread.title: Dirk Wonders If He Could Take Peyton in a 40-Yard Dash
thread.title_full: Dirk Wonders If He Could Take Peyton in a 40-Yard Dash

author: Thomas Duffy
title: Dirk Wonders If He Could Take Peyton in a 40-Yard Dash
text:
Dirk Wonders If He Could Take Peyton in a 40-Yard Dash Bleacher Report 17 hrs ago Thomas Duffy Â© Tony Gutierrez/Associated Press Dirk Nowitzki is far from fast, and he's certainly not smooth. But the Dallas Mavericks big man is a darn good basketball player, so his clunkiness doesn't matter.
AdChoices The same could be said for Denver Broncos quarterback Peyton Manning on the gridiron.
So here's the question: Who's winning in a race between the two?
Had this debate the other day in the locker room: Who wins a 40 yard dash between me and Peyton Manning???
â€” Dirk Nowitzki (@swish41) October 23, 2015 Broncos linebacker Von Miller is taking the 39-year-old QB, while Mavs forward Chandler Parsons is taking the 37-year-old German.
That would be epic! Over/under 5.7? I got Peyton by 1.5yds lolðŸ˜‚ https://t.co/2fc227hDvQ
â€” Von Miller (@Millerlite40) October 23, 2015 Lmao I got Dirk and it's not even close!!! We play in Denver twice in March! https://t.co/jrF533fEhJ
â€” Chandler Parsons (@ChandlerParsons) October 23, 2015 How could you pick against Dirk here? The guy runs up and down the court every night. Manning runs after he throws pick-sixes, but that's about it.
[Twitter, h/t SB Nation ]
